Class AccessLayer

      • createSearchRequest

        public static SearchRequest createSearchRequest(java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String description,
                                                java.lang.String pathToDefaultImg,
                                                java.lang.Long possibleDelivery_from,
                                                java.lang.Long possibleDelivery_to,
                                                double costsAndReward,
                                                double fee,
                                                java.lang.Double lat,
                                                java.lang.Double lng,
                                                java.lang.String address,
                                                User userCreator,
                                                java.lang.String token)
        Method to call ApplicationManager.createAndSaveSearchRequest(String, String, String, Long, Long, double, double, Double, Double, String, User) and create the needed Transaction between the creator and folivora.
        Created on 14.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        title - - the title
        description - - the description
        pathToDefaultImg - - the path to the default img
        possibleDelivery_from - - unix time from which the delivery is possible
        possibleDelivery_to - - unix time till which the delivery is possible
        costsAndReward - - the costs and reward for the delivering person
        fee - - the fee which the creator have to pay folivora
        lat - - lat
        lng - - lng
        address - - the address
        userCreator - - the creator
        token - - the unlock token for this search request
        Returns:
        the created SearchRequest
